author: benh
msg: Resimplifying the deploy scripts to work with conf file more intuitively (i.e. not assigning yet another set of defaults or defining conf vars is shell script that can be defined in conf file).
Also breaking making start-mesos be heirarchical so that you can also just call start-master or start-slaves.
